Package com.tb2dge.main.particle.particles

Class Particle

java.lang.Object
com.tb2dge.main.particle.particles.Particle
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircularParticle, SolidParticle, TrailParticle, WaveParticles
public class Particle extends Object
Creates a new particle object. Takes in a position, a lifespan, a speed, a size, a BufferedImage, and a ParticleHandler.

Not supplying a particle handler throws a NullPointerException.

Version:
20 January 2022
Author:
Caden Vize
See Also:

  • ParticleEmitter

  • Field Details

    • friction

      public double friction
      The rate of change of a particle in the X direction.

  • Constructor Details

    • Particle

      public Particle(double x, double y, double lifespan, double speed, double size, Color color, ParticleHandler particleHandler)
      Creates a particle at the given x point and the given y point.

      Renders a rectangle, at the given size, at the given color, for the given amount of time.

      Parameters:
      x - the X position of the particle.
      y - the Y position of the particle.
      lifespan - the lifespan of the particle. measured in game updates.
      speed - the speed the particle moves.
      size - the size of the particle.
      color - the Color of the particle.
      particleHandler - the ParticleHandler tied to the particle.
      See Also:
      • Color
      • ParticleHandler

    • Particle

      public Particle(double x, double y, double lifespan, double speed, double size, BufferedImage image, ParticleHandler particleHandler)
      Creates a particle at the given x point and the given y point.

      Renders the given image, at the given size, for the given amount of time.

      Parameters:
      x - the X position of the particle.
      y - the Y position of the particle.
      lifespan - the lifespan of the particle. measured in game updates.
      speed - the speed the particle moves.
      size - the size of the particle.
      image - the BufferedImage the particle displays.
      particleHandler - the ParticleHandler tied to the particle.
      See Also:
      • ParticleHandler

  • Method Details

    • addForce

      public void addForce(double xForce, double yForce)
      Applies a velocity force to a particle.
      Parameters:
      xForce - the force applied to the particle. Increases velX by xForce.
      yForce - the force applied to the particle. Increases velY by yForce.

    • addForce

      public void addForce(double spin)
      Applies a spinning force to a particle.
      Parameters:
      spin - the force applied to the particle. Increases rotation speed by spin.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the particle. Changes position, velocity, rotation, and lifespan.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g)
      Renders the particle. If theres an image, renders the image. Otherwise it draws a rectangle.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics2D object used to render the particle.

    • collision

      public void collision(Rectangle rect)
      The function that runs to see if the particle is colliding with anything.
      Parameters:
      rect - the rectangle you wish to check if its colliding with.
